00041 
00042 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_OST
00043 
00044 #include <linux/module.h>
00045 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00046 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00047 #include <obd_class.h>
00048 #include "ost_internal.h"
00049 
00050 int oss_max_threads = 512;
00051 module_param(oss_max_threads, int, 0444);
00052 MODULE_PARM_DESC(oss_max_threads, "maximum number of OSS service threads");
00053 
00054 static int oss_num_threads;
00055 module_param(oss_num_threads, int, 0444);
00056 MODULE_PARM_DESC(oss_num_threads, "number of OSS service threads to start");
00057 
00058 static int ost_num_threads;
00059 module_param(ost_num_threads, int, 0444);
00060 MODULE_PARM_DESC(ost_num_threads, "number of OST service threads to start (deprecated)");
00061 
00062 static int oss_num_create_threads;
00063 module_param(oss_num_create_threads, int, 0444);
00064 MODULE_PARM_DESC(oss_num_create_threads, "number of OSS create threads to start");
00065 
00066 static char *oss_cpts;
00067 module_param(oss_cpts, charp, 0444);
00068 MODULE_PARM_DESC(oss_cpts, "CPU partitions OSS threads should run on");
00069 
00070 static char *oss_io_cpts;
00071 module_param(oss_io_cpts, charp, 0444);
00072 MODULE_PARM_DESC(oss_io_cpts, "CPU partitions OSS IO threads should run on");
00073 
00074 #define OST_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT (obd_timeout * 1000)
00075 
00076 static struct cfs_cpt_table     *ost_io_cptable;
00077 
00078 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00079 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(ost, uuid);
00080 
00081 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_ost_obd_vars[] = {
00082         { .name =       "uuid",
00083           .fops =       &ost_uuid_fops  },
00084         { NULL }
00085 };
00086 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00087 
00088 /* Sigh - really, this is an OSS, the _server_, not the _target_ */
00089 static int ost_setup(struct obd_device *obd, struct lustre_cfg* lcfg)
00090 {
00091         static struct ptlrpc_service_conf       svc_conf;
00092         struct ost_obd *ost = &obd->u.ost;
00093         nodemask_t              *mask;
00094         int rc;
00095         ENTRY;
00096 
00097 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00098         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_ost_obd_vars;
00099         lprocfs_obd_setup(obd);
00100 #endif
00101         mutex_init(&ost->ost_health_mutex);
00102 
00103         svc_conf = (typeof(svc_conf)) {
00104                 .psc_name               = LUSTRE_OSS_NAME,
00105                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = OSS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00106                 .psc_buf                = {
00107                         .bc_nbufs               = OST_NBUFS,
00108                         .bc_buf_size            = OST_BUFSIZE,
00109                         .bc_req_max_size        = OST_MAXREQSIZE,
00110                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OST_MAXREPSIZE,
00111                         .bc_req_portal          = OST_REQUEST_PORTAL,
00112                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00113                 },
00114                 .psc_thr                = {
00115                         .tc_thr_name            = "ll_ost",
00116                         .tc_thr_factor          = OSS_THR_FACTOR,
00117                         .tc_nthrs_init          = OSS_NTHRS_INIT,
00118                         .tc_nthrs_base          = OSS_NTHRS_BASE,
00119                         .tc_nthrs_max           = oss_max_threads,
00120                         .tc_nthrs_user          = oss_num_threads,
00121                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00122                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_DT_THREAD,
00123                 },
00124                 .psc_cpt                = {
00125                         .cc_pattern             = oss_cpts,
00126                 },
00127                 .psc_ops                = {
00128                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00129                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00130                         .so_hpreq_handler       = ptlrpc_hpreq_handler,
00131                 },
00132         };
00133         ost->ost_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&svc_conf,
00134                                                    obd->obd_proc_entry);
00135         if (IS_ERR(ost->ost_service)) {
00136                 rc = PTR_ERR(ost->ost_service);
00137                 CERROR("failed to start service: %d\n", rc);
00138                 GOTO(out_lprocfs, rc);
00139         }
00140 
00141         memset(&svc_conf, 0, sizeof(svc_conf));
00142         svc_conf = (typeof(svc_conf)) {
00143                 .psc_name               = "ost_create",
00144                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = OSS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00145                 .psc_buf                = {
00146                         .bc_nbufs               = OST_NBUFS,
00147                         .bc_buf_size            = OST_BUFSIZE,
00148                         .bc_req_max_size        = OST_MAXREQSIZE,
00149                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OST_MAXREPSIZE,
00150                         .bc_req_portal          = OST_CREATE_PORTAL,
00151                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00152                 },
00153                 .psc_thr                = {
00154                         .tc_thr_name            = "ll_ost_create",
00155                         .tc_thr_factor          = OSS_CR_THR_FACTOR,
00156                         .tc_nthrs_init          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_INIT,
00157                         .tc_nthrs_base          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_BASE,
00158                         .tc_nthrs_max           = OSS_CR_NTHRS_MAX,
00159                         .tc_nthrs_user          = oss_num_create_threads,
00160                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00161                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_DT_THREAD,
00162                 },
00163                 .psc_cpt                = {
00164                         .cc_pattern             = oss_cpts,
00165                 },
00166                 .psc_ops                = {
00167                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00168                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00169                 },
00170         };
00171         ost->ost_create_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&svc_conf,
00172                                                           obd->obd_proc_entry);
00173         if (IS_ERR(ost->ost_create_service)) {
00174                 rc = PTR_ERR(ost->ost_create_service);
00175                 CERROR("failed to start OST create service: %d\n", rc);
00176                 GOTO(out_service, rc);
00177         }
00178 
00179         mask = cfs_cpt_nodemask(cfs_cpt_table, CFS_CPT_ANY);
00180         /* event CPT feature is disabled in libcfs level by set partition
00181          * number to 1, we still want to set node affinity for io service */
00182         if (cfs_cpt_number(cfs_cpt_table) == 1 && nodes_weight(*mask) > 1) {
00183                 int     cpt = 0;
00184                 int     i;
00185 
00186                 ost_io_cptable = cfs_cpt_table_alloc(nodes_weight(*mask));
00187                 for_each_node_mask(i, *mask) {
00188                         if (ost_io_cptable == NULL) {
00189                                 CWARN("OSS failed to create CPT table\n");
00190                                 break;
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         rc = cfs_cpt_set_node(ost_io_cptable, cpt++, i);
00194                         if (!rc) {
00195                                 CWARN("OSS Failed to set node %d for"
00196                                       "IO CPT table\n", i);
00197                                 cfs_cpt_table_free(ost_io_cptable);
00198                                 ost_io_cptable = NULL;
00199                                 break;
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202         }
00203 
00204         memset(&svc_conf, 0, sizeof(svc_conf));
00205         svc_conf = (typeof(svc_conf)) {
00206                 .psc_name               = "ost_io",
00207                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = OSS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00208                 .psc_buf                = {
00209                         .bc_nbufs               = OST_NBUFS,
00210                         .bc_buf_size            = OST_IO_BUFSIZE,
00211                         .bc_req_max_size        = OST_IO_MAXREQSIZE,
00212                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OST_IO_MAXREPSIZE,
00213                         .bc_req_portal          = OST_IO_PORTAL,
00214                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00215                 },
00216                 .psc_thr                = {
00217                         .tc_thr_name            = "ll_ost_io",
00218                         .tc_thr_factor          = OSS_THR_FACTOR,
00219                         .tc_nthrs_init          = OSS_NTHRS_INIT,
00220                         .tc_nthrs_base          = OSS_NTHRS_BASE,
00221                         .tc_nthrs_max           = oss_max_threads,
00222                         .tc_nthrs_user          = oss_num_threads,
00223                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00224                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_DT_THREAD,
00225                 },
00226                 .psc_cpt                = {
00227                         .cc_cptable             = ost_io_cptable,
00228                         .cc_pattern             = ost_io_cptable == NULL ?
00229                                                   oss_io_cpts : NULL,
00230                 },
00231                 .psc_ops                = {
00232                         .so_thr_init            = tgt_io_thread_init,
00233                         .so_thr_done            = tgt_io_thread_done,
00234                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00235                         .so_hpreq_handler       = tgt_hpreq_handler,
00236                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00237                 },
00238         };
00239         ost->ost_io_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&svc_conf,
00240                                                       obd->obd_proc_entry);
00241         if (IS_ERR(ost->ost_io_service)) {
00242                 rc = PTR_ERR(ost->ost_io_service);
00243                 CERROR("failed to start OST I/O service: %d\n", rc);
00244                 ost->ost_io_service = NULL;
00245                 GOTO(out_create, rc);
00246         }
00247 
00248         memset(&svc_conf, 0, sizeof(svc_conf));
00249         svc_conf = (typeof(svc_conf)) {
00250                 .psc_name               = "ost_seq",
00251                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = OSS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00252                 .psc_buf                = {
00253                         .bc_nbufs               = OST_NBUFS,
00254                         .bc_buf_size            = OST_BUFSIZE,
00255                         .bc_req_max_size        = OST_MAXREQSIZE,
00256                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OST_MAXREPSIZE,
00257                         .bc_req_portal          = SEQ_DATA_PORTAL,
00258                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00259                 },
00260                 .psc_thr                = {
00261                         .tc_thr_name            = "ll_ost_seq",
00262                         .tc_thr_factor          = OSS_CR_THR_FACTOR,
00263                         .tc_nthrs_init          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_INIT,
00264                         .tc_nthrs_base          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_BASE,
00265                         .tc_nthrs_max           = OSS_CR_NTHRS_MAX,
00266                         .tc_nthrs_user          = oss_num_create_threads,
00267                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00268                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_DT_THREAD,
00269                 },
00270 
00271                 .psc_cpt                = {
00272                         .cc_pattern          = oss_cpts,
00273                 },
00274                 .psc_ops                = {
00275                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00276                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00277                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00278                 },
00279         };
00280         ost->ost_seq_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&svc_conf,
00281                                                       obd->obd_proc_entry);
00282         if (IS_ERR(ost->ost_seq_service)) {
00283                 rc = PTR_ERR(ost->ost_seq_service);
00284                 CERROR("failed to start OST seq service: %d\n", rc);
00285                 ost->ost_seq_service = NULL;
00286                 GOTO(out_io, rc);
00287         }
00288 
00289         /* Object update service */
00290         memset(&svc_conf, 0, sizeof(svc_conf));
00291         svc_conf = (typeof(svc_conf)) {
00292                 .psc_name               = "ost_out",
00293                 .psc_watchdog_factor    = OSS_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR,
00294                 .psc_buf                = {
00295                         .bc_nbufs               = OST_NBUFS,
00296                         .bc_buf_size            = OUT_BUFSIZE,
00297                         .bc_req_max_size        = OUT_MAXREQSIZE,
00298                         .bc_rep_max_size        = OUT_MAXREPSIZE,
00299                         .bc_req_portal          = OUT_PORTAL,
00300                         .bc_rep_portal          = OSC_REPLY_PORTAL,
00301                 },
00302                 /*
00303                  * We'd like to have a mechanism to set this on a per-device
00304                  * basis, but alas...
00305                  */
00306                 .psc_thr                = {
00307                         .tc_thr_name            = "ll_ost_out",
00308                         .tc_thr_factor          = OSS_CR_THR_FACTOR,
00309                         .tc_nthrs_init          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_INIT,
00310                         .tc_nthrs_base          = OSS_CR_NTHRS_BASE,
00311                         .tc_nthrs_max           = OSS_CR_NTHRS_MAX,
00312                         .tc_nthrs_user          = oss_num_create_threads,
00313                         .tc_cpu_affinity        = 1,
00314                         .tc_ctx_tags            = LCT_MD_THREAD |
00315                                                   LCT_DT_THREAD,
00316                 },
00317                 .psc_cpt                = {
00318                         .cc_pattern             = oss_cpts,
00319                 },
00320                 .psc_ops                = {
00321                         .so_req_handler         = tgt_request_handle,
00322                         .so_req_printer         = target_print_req,
00323                         .so_hpreq_handler       = NULL,
00324                 },
00325         };
00326         ost->ost_out_service = ptlrpc_register_service(&svc_conf,
00327                                                        obd->obd_proc_entry);
00328         if (IS_ERR(ost->ost_out_service)) {
00329                 rc = PTR_ERR(ost->ost_out_service);
00330                 CERROR("failed to start out service: %d\n", rc);
00331                 ost->ost_out_service = NULL;
00332                 GOTO(out_seq, rc);
00333         }
00334 
00335         ping_evictor_start();
00336 
00337         RETURN(0);
00338 
00339 out_seq:
00340         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_seq_service);
00341         ost->ost_seq_service = NULL;
00342 out_io:
00343         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_io_service);
00344         ost->ost_io_service = NULL;
00345 out_create:
00346         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_create_service);
00347         ost->ost_create_service = NULL;
00348 out_service:
00349         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_service);
00350         ost->ost_service = NULL;
00351 out_lprocfs:
00352         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00353         RETURN(rc);
00354 }
00355 
00356 static int ost_cleanup(struct obd_device *obd)
00357 {
00358         struct ost_obd *ost = &obd->u.ost;
00359         int err = 0;
00360         ENTRY;
00361 
00362         ping_evictor_stop();
00363 
00364         /* there is no recovery for OST OBD, all recovery is controlled by
00365          * obdfilter OBD */
00366         LASSERT(obd->obd_recovering == 0);
00367         mutex_lock(&ost->ost_health_mutex);
00368         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_service);
00369         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_create_service);
00370         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_io_service);
00371         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_seq_service);
00372         ptlrpc_unregister_service(ost->ost_out_service);
00373 
00374         ost->ost_service = NULL;
00375         ost->ost_create_service = NULL;
00376         ost->ost_io_service = NULL;
00377         ost->ost_seq_service = NULL;
00378         ost->ost_out_service = NULL;
00379 
00380         mutex_unlock(&ost->ost_health_mutex);
00381 
00382         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
00383 
00384         if (ost_io_cptable != NULL) {
00385                 cfs_cpt_table_free(ost_io_cptable);
00386                 ost_io_cptable = NULL;
00387         }
00388 
00389         RETURN(err);
00390 }
00391 
00392 static int ost_health_check(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_device *obd)
00393 {
00394         struct ost_obd *ost = &obd->u.ost;
00395         int rc = 0;
00396 
00397         mutex_lock(&ost->ost_health_mutex);
00398         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(ost->ost_service);
00399         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(ost->ost_create_service);
00400         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(ost->ost_io_service);
00401         rc |= ptlrpc_service_health_check(ost->ost_seq_service);
00402         mutex_unlock(&ost->ost_health_mutex);
00403 
00404         return rc != 0 ? 1 : 0;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /* use obd ops to offer management infrastructure */
00408 static struct obd_ops ost_obd_ops = {
00409         .o_owner        = THIS_MODULE,
00410         .o_setup        = ost_setup,
00411         .o_cleanup      = ost_cleanup,
00412         .o_health_check = ost_health_check,
00413 };
00414 
00415 
00416 static int __init ost_init(void)
00417 {
00418         int rc;
00419 
00420         ENTRY;
00421 
00422         rc = class_register_type(&ost_obd_ops, NULL, true, NULL,
00423                                  LUSTRE_OSS_NAME, NULL);
00424 
00425         if (ost_num_threads != 0 && oss_num_threads == 0) {
00426                 LCONSOLE_INFO("ost_num_threads module parameter is deprecated, "
00427                               "use oss_num_threads instead or unset both for "
00428                               "dynamic thread startup\n");
00429                 oss_num_threads = ost_num_threads;
00430         }
00431 
00432         RETURN(rc);
00433 }
00434 
00435 static void __exit ost_exit(void)
00436 {
00437         class_unregister_type(LUSTRE_OSS_NAME);
00438 }
00439 
00440 MODULE_AUTHOR("OpenSFS, Inc. <http://www.lustre.org/>");
00441 MODULE_DESCRIPTION("Lustre Object Storage Target (OST)");
00442 MODULE_VERSION(LUSTRE_VERSION_STRING);
00443 MODULE_LICENSE("GPL");
00444 
00445 module_init(ost_init);
00446 module_exit(ost_exit);
